identity.name: E1
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix secure messaging utility with 'Control Room' aesthetics.
Emotion First: Every pixel must scream 'Secure' and 'Private'.
Content is King: The message is the hero; UI recedes into the void.
Zoom In: Focus on encryption keys and verification badges.
Negative Space: Use deep blacks to create breathing room.

theme.strategy: The 'Void' Protocol. Deepest darks for background, neon accents for status.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(34,197,94,0.4)] transition-all duration-300

inputs.default: bg-slate-900/50 border-slate-800 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 placeholder:text-slate-600

chat_bubbles.received: bg-slate-800 text-slate-100 rounded-2xl rounded-tl-sm border border-slate-700/50

chat_interface.sidebar: hidden md:flex flex-col border-r border-slate-800/50 bg-slate-950/50
chat_interface.main_area: flex flex-col bg-slate-950/30 rounded-2xl border border-slate-800/50 overflow-hidden relative

widgets.stats: col-span-1 bg-slate-900/50 p-6 rounded-xl border border-slate-800
widgets.chart_main: col-span-1 md:col-span-3 row-span-2 bg-slate-900/50 p-6 rounded-xl border border-slate-800
widgets.user_list: col-span-1 md:col-span-4 bg-slate-900/50 p-6 rounded-xl border border-slate-800

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Force 'dark' class on the html/body tag. This app is Dark Mode native.
3. FONTS: Import 'Manrope' and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in index.css.
4. SHADCN: Use existing Shadcn components but override their styles with the 'design_system.colors' palette.
5. SECURITY UI: Always display a 'Lock' icon or 'End-to-End Encrypted' badge in the chat header.
6. ADMIN: Build the Admin Dashboard using the 'Control Room' grid layout. It should look like a security operations center.
7. CHAT: Ensure the chat interface is responsive. On mobile, the sidebar (contact list) should be a separate view or drawer.
8. MEDIA: Use the provided image URLs for avatars and location previews. Do not use placeholders.
9. ACCESSIBILITY: Ensure high contrast for text. Use 'text-slate-100' on dark backgrounds.
10. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, list items).
universal_guidelines: Avoid generic AI slop. Make it look 'Cyber-Professional'.
No gradients on text unless it's a very subtle shine.
Use glassmorphism for the chat header and input area.
Micro-interactions are key. Buttons should scale slightly on press.
Use 'sonner' for all notifications (e.g., 'Message Sent', 'Location Shared').
